questions.question_text: When eliciting requirements, a good time to consider using the interviewing method is when:

A business analyst is attempting to elicit requirements on a current project. The business subject matter experts (SMEs) from various departments in the company question how the solution will work with their various systems.
Which modeling technique should the business analyst use to depict how the solution will work with all of the company’s systems?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Interface modelling focuses on the interactions

C. Interface modeling.

Interface modeling focuses on representing the interactions and connections between different systems, applications, and components within an organization. It helps visualize the interfaces, data flows, and integration points between the solution being developed and the existing systems in the company.
